rules_text:
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if it doesn’t share a name with another land you control or a land card in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Caring Cultivator.
At the beginning of your end step, if Caring Cultivator has power 9 or greater, transform it.
rules_text2:
Vigilance, trample, ward {2}
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if it doesn’t share a name with another land you control or a land card in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
